portfolio.title: Location-Job Analysis
portfolio.description: Our project predicts salaries, analyzes job descriptions, and visualizes job trends. Through data preprocessing and modeling, we uncover insights into factors influencing salaries and geographical trends.

portfolio.title: She Shield Android Application
portfolio.description: Developed a women's safety app integrating Firebase for secure user authentication. Implemented continuous location monitoring for real-time updates to emergency contacts, significantly reducing response times.

portfolio.title: Breast Cancer Detection DL
portfolio.description: Designed a deep learning breast cancer detection model, achieving 78% accuracy with a limited dataset. Also, introduced a 3D-printed microscope holder to local healthcare professionals, helping bridge data gaps for early detection

portfolio.title: Car Sales Analysis using Data Mining
portfolio.description: Our projects aim was to create a model which predicts the car price given its description, age and features which would be helpful for potential buyers, sellers and manufactures know what the customer really wants.
